Someone reused a prime while generating RSA keys. Can you recover the secret message encrypted as 389369004931088435375790052237076572020960205342065005550751980238777625043537633366137459669651344162740053259979496026685710783458017908197280395514283460554195574097895450310643507976482553178929798400769395238512555639457220830?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=395971329026999122854082223323919659507591909938558881586686739047643524037826887879973357530795477838591224204272797713359190519377175273172974621270624650118790995442022706749545507556766391165098797742438752470341613530799120441, e=126469928947176075800936425119647902801282547566790367275488106584804173156640048481365224365854374053138060001559141954253421881557967289322507752042636956102525742058695160511172475385954588860830993495147035602200794193316679681

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{6fau05er}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 389369004931088435375790052237076572020960205342065005550751980238777625043537633366137459669651344162740053259979496026685710783458017908197280395514283460554195574097895450310643507976482553178929798400769395238512555639457220830
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=395971329026999122854082223323919659507591909938558881586686739047643524037826887879973357530795477838591224204272797713359190519377175273172974621270624650118790995442022706749545507556766391165098797742438752470341613530799120441, e=126469928947176075800936425119647902801282547566790367275488106584804173156640048481365224365854374053138060001559141954253421881557967289322507752042636956102525742058695160511172475385954588860830993495147035602200794193316679681
extra_info: p=19899028343791038553787753689073205181607434272803396034630921329180619671377409910901005156546670866772189552360021, q=19899028343791038553787753689073205181607434272803396034630921329180619671377409910901005156546670866772189552360021, Ï†(n)=395971329026999122854082223323919659507591909938558881586686739047643524037826887879973357530795477838591224204272757915302502937300067697665596474860261435250245388649953444906887146317423636345276995732125659128608069151694400400
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
